title: Add hero visual element to LoginPage homepage

requirements.summary: Add a hero visual element at the top of the LoginPage component before the existing mission text section. The visual should be an abstract community-focused illustration that represents Phil3's philanthropic mission.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero visual element is positioned at the top of the LoginPage before the mission text section
Visual uses an abstract community-focused design that aligns with Phil3's philanthropic mission
Image is properly integrated into the existing layout without breaking the current styling
Visual loads as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Add hero visual element at the top of the LoginPage component before the existing mission text section. Import and display the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-community.dim_1200x400.png as a static asset positioned before the headline and mission content. Ensure the image is responsive and maintains aspect ratio without breaking the existing layout styling or authentication flow.
